actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of the historic resources of Camden, South Carolina, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to prepare a study of historical Camden, South Carolina, to determine the feasibility and desirability of estabishing such area as a unit of the National Park System, and to transmit such study to the President and specified Congressional committees.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of the historic resources of Camden, South Carolina, and for other purposes.
